pageContext.claim: “My uncle was a great professor at MIT for many years. Dr. John Trump. And I didn't talk to him about this particular subject, but I have a natural instinct for science, and I will say that you have scientists on both sides of the picture.”
pageContext.analysis: Scientists in Trump's own administration say climate change is real and that man contributes to it. He is exaggerating that there are scientists on "both sides of the picture."
